attributes.action: Start a full national enquiry into grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: We request the government form and independent body to examine and investigate the grooming gangs and those involved in covering up the offences
attributes.background:
A full enquiry into 
Those responsible for the cover up within government, CPS, councils, police and other govt bodies.
The religious and ethnic composition of gang members. 
Why communities covered up their men committing the offences
The true numbers of girls affected
Their ethnic background

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
